sentence: NEWTOWN — The banners and big red video screen all said Dr. Oz, the host gave a rousing introduction and in strode the candidate, Mehmet Oz, to take up the microphone and become the center of attention for more than an hour.
author: Associated Press
title: No notes, same logo: Dr. Oz's campaign is like his TV show

sentence: NEWTOWN, Pa. (AP) — The banners and big red video screen all said Dr. Oz, the host gave a rousing introduction and in strode the candidate, Mehmet Oz, to take up the microphone and become the center of attention for more than an hour.
author: MARC LEVY
title: No notes, same logo: Dr. Oz’s campaign is like his TV show

sentence: The banners and big red video screen all said Dr. Oz, the host gave a rousing introduction and in strode the candidate, Mehmet Oz, to take up the microphone and become the center of attention for more than an hour.

title: No notes, same logo: Dr. Oz's campaign is like his TV show
